Package es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.control

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameFactory
    Interface for game factories.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConsoleCtrl
    A console controller that does not use MVC -- you can see this in the ConsoleCtrl.start() method since it prints the state of the game in each iteration of the while loop, etc.
    ConsoleCtrlMVC
    A controller that uses MVC.
    ConsolePlayer
    A class that implements a player that inputs its moves by console.
    ConsolePlayerFromListOfMoves
    A class that implements a player that inputs its moves by console.
    Controller
    The controller's top class.
    DummyAIPlayer
    Class that implements an AI player by encapsulating a Player given in the construction.
    Player
    Abstract class for implementing game players.
